definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: majesty, pride (cf. Syr. ga0yuwto0)—Job 41:7 + 6 t.; cstr. [[גַּאֲוַת]] Pr 29:23 + 2 t.; sf. [[גַּאֲוׇתִי]] Is 13:3 + 8 t.;—
rising up, swelling of the sea Ps 46:4.
majesty, of Israel De 33:29, Moab Is 16:6 = Je 48:29, scales of crocodile Job 41:7, of God De 33:26, Ps 68:35.
pride, haughtiness Ps 10:2, Ps 31:19, Ps 31:24, Ps 36:12, Ps 73:6, Pr 14:3, Pr 29:23, Is 9:8, Is 13:11, Is 25:11; [[עליזי]] [[גאותי]] my proudly exulting ones Is 13:3 cf. Zep 3:11.
